General.Name: Alucon Public Company Limited
General.Description: Alucon Public Company Limited produces and distributes aluminum containers primarily in Thailand. The company operates in two segments, Can and Tube, and Slug. It offers aluminum collapsible tubes, monobloc aerosol cans, bottles, and rigid wall containers. The company also provides technical impact extrusions, aluminium slugs, aluminium coils, aluminium pellets, strips, plates, etc. It exports its products to various countries, including Japan, Australia, the United States, Indonesia, and South Africa. The company was founded in 1961 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.
General.Address: 500 Moo 1, Soi Sirikam, Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10270
